#labels Phase-Implementation
<strong>1. Assign a permission to a user or a worker role</strong>

Name: assign

How to use: Permission::assign($who, $permission);

Param: $who - assign target, could be an account person account id or a worker role type name
             $permission - permission name

return: true or error message


2. Check if a user or a worker role has a certain permission

Name: check

How to use: Permission::check($who, $permission);

Param: $who - assign target, could be an account person account id or a worker role type name
             $permission - permission name

return: true or false

3. Unassign a permission for a certain user or a worker role

Name: unassign

How to use: Permission::unassign($who, $permission);

Param:$who - assign target, could be an account person account id or a worker role type name
             $permission - permission name

return: true or error message

4. Add new permission

Permission::add($permission);

5. Delete permission

Permission::delete($permission);
